Text: Thank you. Thank you for the information you supplied. Wish everyone took the time to do this.  It's a shame that no one else has taken the time to say thank you.

Many thanks Deathmule - you are the man when it comes to quality TV/DVD encoded releases.

By the way lee369, give everyone a chance to say thanks - the torrents only been up for a few hours;-)

Superb - thanks for wrapping up the season so tidily.
Happy Xmas.
